creator: arkadi.shishlov@gmail.com
text:
Server Name field might be empty in test results output because AB uses case-sensitive comparison to extract the Server HTTP header, yet widely used Cowboy Erlang web framework outputs lowercased headers only (by design).

p = strstr(c->cbuff, "Server:");
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/httpd/httpd/trunk/support/ab.c?view=markup
around line 1540.

https://github.com/ninenines/cowboy/blob/master/doc/src/guide/resp.ezdoc#L22
